DataElement.preferredName: Wegener's Granulomatosis Involvement  Extent Disease Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field to describe the extent of involvement of the Wegener's Granulomatosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A multisystem disease chiefly affecting males, characterized by necrotizing granulomatous vasculitis involving the upper and lower respiratory tracts, glomerulonephritis, and variable degrees of systemic, small vessel vasculitis, which is generally considered to represent an aberrant hypersensitivity reaction to an unknown antigen. (Dorland, 27th ed)_To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A multisystem disease chiefly affecting males, characterized by necrotizing granulomatous vasculitis involving the upper and lower respiratory tracts, glomerulonephritis, and variable degrees of systemic, small vessel vasculitis, which is generally considered to represent an aberrant hypersensitivity reaction to an unknown antigen. (Dorland, 27th ed)

Concepts.definition: A rare, autoimmune, systemic medium and small size vasculitis. It is characterized by the formation of necrotizing granulomas in the respiratory tract, necrotizing angiitis, and glomerulonephritis.

Property.preferredDefinition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify the involvement or extent of disease.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

ClassificationSchemes.longName: Artificial Neural Network Algorithm for BRIDG Mapping

ReferenceDocuments.name: Specify the type of wegener g

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping path for CDE:2750646
ReferenceDocuments.description: "PerformedDiagnosis [primary] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedObservation [assessment] > AssessedResultRelationship > PerformedDiagnosis.resultClassificationCode(ANY=>CD).originalText [secondary] WHERE  PerformedDiagnosis.value [primary] = ""wegener granulomatosis"" AND PerformedDiagnosis.resultClassificationCode [secondary] = {specified disorder} AND PerformedDiagnosis [primary] > PerformedProcedure [overall HCT process] AND PerformedObservation [assessment] > PerformedClinicalInterpretation.value = ""Involvement""  AND PerformedObservation [assessment] > DefinedObservation.nameCode = ""Assess Involvement"""
